title: HPE security advisory (AV25-768)
description: On November 18, 2025, HPE published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: HPE Aruba Networking AOS-CX  multiple versions and platforms
HPE Aruba Networking Management Software (AirWave)  versions 8.3.0.4 and prior
HPE Aruba Networking 100 Series Cellular Bridge AOS-10.7.1.x  versions 10.7.1.1 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
